explanation: [0-0] In a room with a green screen hanging, a woman wearing pink clothes and rabbit ear decorations on her head is sitting on the left. She is holding half a watermelon in her left hand and a spoon with a piece of watermelon flesh in it near her mouth with her right hand. In the middle stands a little girl in a pink dress, her arms crossed and her eyes looking forward. On the right, a young man in blue clothes is squatting, holding a black hairdryer, pointing it to the left, and looking at the little girl in the middle. There is a mobile phone on the left side of the screen, showing a room with blue windows. On the screen, there are a woman holding a watermelon and a little girl standing.

[0-4] Then the little girl standing in the middle opens her mouth wide and starts crying. The young woman with rabbit ears on the left is eating watermelon, then she moves her face closer to the little girl standing in the middle. Afterwards, she continues to sit and eat watermelon, while the little girl continues to cry beside her. At the same time, the mobile phone screen on the left synchronizes the actions of the two people.

At the same time, the mobile phone screen on the left synchronizes the actions of the two people.

[4-8] Next, the little girl in the pink dress crosses her arms in front of her face. Then she opens her mouth wide, stretches out her arms downwards, with an angry expression on her face. At the same time, the picture on the mobile phone screen starts to change. A flame effect appears under the feet of the little girl in the pink dress. The flame gradually grows larger and brighter. Then the woman with rabbit ears on the left turns her head to look at the little girl, then hands the watermelon in her hand to the little girl.
